amendment.description: An amendment numbered 85 printed in Part F of House Report 118-216 to reduce to $1 the salary of the Director of the Center for Drug Evaluation and Research at the FDA.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Good (VA) amendment (A035) Failed by recorded vote: 152 - 278 (Roll no. 420).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Good (VA) amendment (A035) Failed by recorded vote: 152 - 278 (Roll no. 420).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
